title: baseFeePerGas is incorrect in BSHB0010, etc
body:
[BlockchainTests/EIPTests/bc4895-withdrawals/withdrawalsAmountBounds.json](https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/develop/BlockchainTests/EIPTests/bc4895-withdrawals/withdrawalsAmountBounds.json) has incorrect `baseFeePerGas` in block 1 (Test vector BSHB0010). It should be 0x09 instead of 0x0a.
```
        "genesisBlockHeader" : {
            "baseFeePerGas" : "0x0a",
            ...
            "gasLimit" : "0x7fffffffffffffff",
            "gasUsed" : "0x00",
            ...
```
According to [EIP-1559](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1559), in block 1 `baseFeePerGas` should decrease by 1. Here's a Python 3 script to verify:
```
BASE_FEE_MAX_CHANGE_DENOMINATOR = 8
parent_base_fee_per_gas = 0x0a
parent_gas_used = 0x00
parent_gas_target = 0x7fffffffffffffff
gas_used_delta = parent_gas_target - parent_gas_used
base_fee_per_gas_delta = parent_base_fee_per_gas * gas_used_delta // parent_gas_target // BASE_FEE_MAX_CHANGE_DENOMINATOR
expected_base_fee_per_gas = parent_base_fee_per_gas - base_fee_per_gas_delta
print (expected_base_fee_per_gas)
```

Other tests in BlockchainTests/EIPTests/bc4895-withdrawals suffer from the same issue.
